name: Another Top Down Shooter
description:
MADE IN ABOUT A DAY FOR  GAME JAM +

This is another top down shooter, yes they are quite a few that I've made,

The game has no complicated controls just choose an ability then use the LMB to use it, you can only move when you use the ability, the games is simple but can get quite chaotic in a few seconds so get ready to rage

Game by:

Waza Banda(me) zambia
